sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"小的"之意。
means: little ： 指在体积、数量、距离、年龄、身材等方面比正常的小，多带主观感情色彩，含小而可爱或小巧的意味。
small ： 多指数量、面积、体积、价值、数字或意义等的小或少，指略小于正常的大小。
tiny ： 强调与同类或其他物体比较，小得超
出正常比例，有时带强烈的感情色彩。
minute ： 指小得难看见，有时需用显微镜才看得见。
miniature ： 指由正常体积微缩的物体。

sentence.Network_en: Investment remains tiny primarily because of the exorbitant cost of land.
sentence.Network_cn: 投资仍然微乎其微，主要原因在于土地成本过高。

sentence.Network_en: The lungs are in fact constructed of thousands of tiny tubes.
sentence.Network_cn: 肺实际上由上千条细微的气管构成。

sentence.Network_en: The current national poster child is a tiny, freckle-faced redhead.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在的那个全国广告代言人个头不高，红头发，脸上有雀斑。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: extension of obsolete tine, 'small, diminutive', of unknown origin

entry.def: Something or someone that is tiny is extremely small.

example.ex: Though she was tiny, she had a very loud voice...
example.tran: 她虽然个头小，嗓音却非常洪亮。

sentences.sentence: "the flyspeck nation of Bahrain moved toward democracy"

auth_sentence.content: Pitfalls to avoid, tiny gains to be made.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pitfalls to avoid, tiny gains to be made.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pitfalls to avoid, tiny gains to be made.

auth_sentence.content: It is tiny and contains only a few paintings.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is tiny and contains only a few paintings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is tiny and contains only a few paintings.

auth_sentence.content: Oh and that tiny thing, necessary for life.
auth_sentence.res_content: Oh and that tiny thing, necessary for life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Oh and that tiny thing, necessary for life.

Sentence.sentence: Houses built before 1939 use about 50% more energy per square foot than those built after 2000, mainly due to the tiny cracks and gaps that expand over time and let in more outside air.

means.word_mean: 极小的, 微小的,微量的

sentences.en: The baby put his tiny hand in mine.
sentences.cn: 那个婴儿把小手放在我的手中。

sentences.en: I live in a tiny cottage.
sentences.cn: 我住在一间极小的茅屋里。

sentences.en: Some stars look as tiny as pinheads, but they are even bigger than the sun in fact.
sentences.cn: 有些星星看起来像针头一样小, 但它们实际上甚至比太阳还大。

jushi.english: This tiny woman has an incredible appetite.
jushi.chinese: 这位小巧玲珑的妇人竟有那么大的胃口。

jushi.english: Because of the housing shortage many couples had to double up in one tiny apartment.
jushi.chinese: 由于住房紧张,许多对夫妻只好挤住在一幢小公寓里。

jushi.english: The brush has tiny red berries on it.
jushi.chinese: 灌木丛中长着红色的小浆果。
